title.narrative: BEHAVIOR CHANGE FOR INCREASED ACCESS & RETENTION

description.narrative: Families, communities and municipalities have enhanced capacities to promote enrolment, retention and protection of children in school, especially girls, and those affected by crises., which contributes to Access To Quality Learning Opportunities, Access To Quality Learning Opportunities (Covid), Evaluation, Learning, Skills, Participation And Engagement, Research. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Community Engagement, Social And Behaviour Change, Evaluations, Research And Data, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: School-aged girls and boys, especially the most vulnerable, those affected by crises or those living in rural areas, acquire fundamental knowledge and instrumental skills necessary for life in a safe, protective and inclusive school environment.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Families, communities and municipalities have enhanced capacities to promote enrolment, retention and protection of children inschool, especially girls, and those affected by crises.

description.narrative: ;En 2021, l’UNICEF a permis d’assurer la continuité éducative de 108 015 enfants (52 355 filles et 5 783 avec handicap) en dehors de l’école affectés par les crises humanitaires. Par ailleurs, 6 328 enfants non scolarisés et déscolarisés (3 722 filles) ont eu accès à des dispositifs d’éducation alternative et de formation professionnalisante de courte durée. L’UNICEF a également appuyé une étude sur les perceptions des communautés sur l&39;éducation à distance et les discussions sont en cours avec les compagnies de téléphonie mobile (Zamani, Airtel) pour faciliter l&39;accès aux contenus éducatifs et à l&39;information.;; | Status:On-track | As-of Date:23/12/2021
